lines.text:
[as Homer climbs down from the chapel steeple]
Senor Homer... will we have bells?
Nobody tells Homer Smith what he can't do!

[as they watch Homer drive away into the night]
Will Schmidt come back?

[to Mother Maria, who is staring in amazement as she hears the bells in the chapel steeple ringing]
The chapel is now finished.

[Mrs. Everett has withdrawn her funding and support because of Felicia's pregnancy]
What did the rich lady want?

[pause, then]
She is not rich... she is poor.
